text: Oof, I'm learning that a lot of Java developers think a multidimensional array is a vector of vectors.

elements.text: Oof, I'm learning that a lot of Java developers think a multidimensional array is a vector of vectors.

text: Mind expounding on this some more? I've run into the same thing and was curious what your insights have been as I have been wondering what causes this pattern of thinking.

elements.text: Mind expounding on this some more? I've run into the same thing and was curious what your insights have been as I have been wondering what causes this pattern of thinking.

text: I think this is how multidimensional arrays were implemented in Java, long ago, no?

elements.text: I think this is how multidimensional arrays were implemented in Java, long ago, no?

text: People naturally think their language should support such a thing as a first class intrinsic, and I guess an array of arrays _looks_ like what one might expect that to be
